turn.2: Quercus germana Quercus germana, the Mexican royal oak, is a species of oak tree in the Fagaceae family.
turn.4: The tree is endemic to eastern and northeastern Mexico, in the states (north to south) of Tamaulipas, San Luis Potosí, Querétaro, Veracruz, Hidalgo, Puebla, and Oaxaca.
turn.6: It grows in cloud forest habitats, at elevations of .

turn.10: It is an IUCN Red List Vulnerable species, threatened by habitat loss.
